abstract: After months of posturing, BHP Billiton finally unveiled a $147.4 billion offer for the Rio Tinto Group in what would be one of the largest mergers in history.
lead_paragraph: After months of posturing, BHP Billiton finally unveiled a $147.4 billion offer for the Rio Tinto Group in what would be one of the largest mergers in history.

headline.main: BHP Makes $147 Billion Offer for Rio Tinto
